first_translate: when you hold my hand...
unlike you, more things come to mind for me.
at first,  I want to hug you... touch you...
and then after that--
huh?
wait,
w-wait a minute... is this...
k-
mm
get your head together, fiona.
goodness...
it wasn’t a kiss!
uh, so...
let’s get this straight...

hangle: 나랑 성적인 의미로 이것저것 하고 싶다?
first_translate: do you wanna do stuff with me sexually?
I’ve been thinking about what you said last time,

hangle: 좀 더 그럴듯하게 정리할 수는 없어?
first_translate: but can’t you put it into better words than that?

hangle: 아니면 진짜 내 말이 그렇게 들린 거야?
first_translate: or did you really mean it that way?
hmm...

hangle: 그런 그냥 네 젊은 날의 본능에 따른 거니,
first_translate: is it just because of your youthful instincts,
or...
fiona.

hangle: 내가 여자만 보면 눈 돌아가는 한심한 놈처럼 보여?
first_translate: does it seem as if I’m some pathetic guy who loses all self-control when he sees women?
the reason why those thoughts came up was because of you.
to be exact,
it’s only you.
is this a confession?
yep.
this is a confession.
I like you,
fiona.
siegren...
take it easy.
there’s no need to rush yourself.
I confessed now because I didn’t want someone else to take you away from me before I could say anything.
that’s all.
alright, then.
sleep tight, fiona.
th-this isn’t...
a dream, right?!!
I couldn’t sleep at all.

hangle: 어젯밤 일이 역시 꿈이 아니었던 거겠지…
first_translate: then again, maybe everything that happened yesterday wasn’t a dream either...
fiona.
something must’ve happened between you and sieg last night.
how perceptive.
no... nothing happened.
which one is it?
what are you talking about?
first option: he confessed his feelings to you.
second option:

hangle: 시그렌이 네가 불쾌할 만한 짓을 했다.
first_translate: sieg did something inappropriate to you.
if it’s the former, I’ll let him live.
if it’s the latter, we’re gonna make it look like a natural death.
make whose death look like a natural one?
sieg’s?
i-it’s the first option!
really?
come on, don’t give me such a disappointed face.
still,

hangle: 너라면 고백을 들어도 평소처럼 웃으면서 차버릴 줄 알았는데.
first_translate: I thought even if someone were to confess their love to you, you’d reject them while smiling like always.
I’m not heartless enough to do that.

hangle: 그러면 고백 정도는 알아서 해결해 봐라.
first_translate: in any case, figure out how to deal with his confession by yourself.

hangle: 그 이상이면 내가 처리해 줄 테니.
first_translate: if there’s anything beyond that, I’ll handle it myself.
so basically, you’re saying I shouldn’t kill sieg...
I’m doomed...
all of this is because of sieg.

hangle: 자연사 위장 운운하는 아벨에게 상담할 수도 없고.
first_translate: not only am I unable to talk to abel since he keeps mentioning making deaths appear “natural,”

hangle: 지금쯤이면 유니스와 서서히 연인이 되어야 하는 시점일 텐데.
first_translate: even though I should start developing romantic feelings toward eunice around this point,
now sieg has gone ahead and confessed his love to me instead!

hangle: 내가 그렇게 열심히 운명적인 사랑을 써 놨는데!
first_translate: I worked so hard writing our destined romance story too!

hangle: ‘왜 유니스를 안 좋아해’ 라고 물을 수도 없고!
first_translate: on top of that, I can’t ask him why he doesn’t like eunice!

hangle: 시그렌은 대체 왜 날 좋아하는 거지?
first_translate: why does sieg like me anyway?
we used to be good friends.

hangle: 아니, 더 정확히는 내가 시그렌의 좋은 친구로 있고 싶었어.
first_translate: no, actually, I wanted us to become close friends.

hangle: 그게 어린 시그렌에게 정서적으로 도움이 될 거라 생각했으니까.
first_translate: I believed being friendly would help young sieg emotionally.

hangle: …돌이켜 보면 결국 모든 게 내 알량한 만족을 채우기 위한 것이었을지도.
first_translate: looking back, perhaps everything I did was merely done to satisfy my own ego.

hangle: 시그렌에게 잘 대해 주면서 정도 들고, 나름대로 내 죄책감도 덜었었지.
first_translate: while treating sieg well made me feel virtuous, it also helped ease my guilt.
although I honestly wish for sieg’s happiness,

hangle: 딱히 그를 온전하게 진심 어린 우정으로 대하고 있던 건 아니었어.
first_translate: I never treated him wholeheartedly or sincerely as a friend.

hangle: 이런 내 위선을 모르고 시그렌이 반했다면 미안한 일이야.
first_translate: if sieg fell for me without realizing my hypocrisy, I truly apologize.

hangle: 그리고 상황 자체도 고민할 여지가 있어.
first_translate: also, the situation itself poses several problems.

hangle: 내 입장에서는 원작의 흐름대로 가도 문제고, 안 가도 문제잖아.
first_translate: from where I stand, whether I follow the original storyline or stray off course, both options pose issues.

hangle: 전자라면 당연히 내 결말은 영혼까지 고통받는 베드 엔딩이지.
first_translate: obviously, following the novel will lead to a bad ending where I suffer until my soul dies.
straying off course comes with its own set of problems too...

hangle: 후에 어둠은 계속 나타나고, 마물의 흉포화는 더욱 많이 진행될 거란 거지.
first_translate: for instance, darkness will continue appearing later on, which will cause monsters to grow increasingly violent.

hangle: 결국 시간이 지나면 막을 수 없을 게 분명해.
first_translate: eventually, they won’t be able to stop themselves once time passes.

hangle: 어둠을 없애려면 유니스가 가진 힘이 필수인데,
first_translate: in order to eliminate the darkness, eunice’s power is essential.

hangle: 그 유니스의 힘을 본격적으로 각성시키는 계기가 바로 시그렌과의 사랑이라고~!
first_translate: however, her powers awaken due to falling in love with sieg!

hangle: 시그렌과 이어지지 않은 유니스가 영영 자신의 힘을 각성하지 못한다면…
first_translate: if eunice fails to realize her potential forever because she didn’t end up with sieg,
the world might fall apart.

hangle: 유니스와 시그렌의 힘으로 어둠을 어느 정도 몰아내지만,
first_translate: with eunice and sieg working together, they manage to push the darkness back somewhat.

hangle: 내가 죽지는 않는 결말… 같은 건 불가능할까.
first_translate: but is it impossible to create an alternate ending where I survive...?

hangle: 아니, 그보다도 당장 눈앞에 닥친 일이 문제야~!
first_translate: wait, forget that! the problem lies here and now!

hangle: 시그렌한테 고백받은 거 어떻게 할 거냐구~
first_translate: what am I supposed to do about sieg’s confession?!

hangle: 생각해보면 결혼하자는 이야기를 들은 것도 아니고,
first_translate: come to think of it, he didn’t propose marriage or anything.
he simply confessed his feelings.
should I just swallow my tears and flat-out turn him down?
fiona, are you home?
